New Records: Mexico equalized in the 11th minute of stoppage time to overturn a 2-0 deficit against Honduras
Edson Alvarez scored a controversial goal to bring Mexico level
Honduras received two red cards during the match
Key Match Events: Mexico's equalizer came in the 11th minute of stoppage time
Honduras was reduced to 10 men and then 9 men due to two red cards
The match went to a penalty shootout after the controversial goal
Post-Match Reflections: Mexico's manager praised Edson Alvarez for his crucial goal
Honduras's loss was a major setback for their Copa America qualification hopes
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a high-stakes encounter for Mexico to secure Copa America qualification
Honduras struggled to hold onto their lead during the penalty shootout
